
This is an evolutionary version of RTLinux 3.2. There is little
change from 3.1 but 3.2 is mainly there to gather new stuff.

Added software:

Unsupported: This directory contains contributed software that FSMLabs
	has not tested. 

	Rnet	by Robert Kovler
		A package for allowing the RT system to use the sockets
		api to connect to the Linux device driver.

	Kernel patches for later Linux kernels.

	rtlutil	a library of utilities for RTLinux from Yodaiken.
